summary: After the collapse of the Yugoslavian government, a former secret agent, now a taxi driver, enters the office of a former university professor, now a firm director.
cast: Bora Todorovic|Branislav Lecic|Natasa Ninkovic|Dragan Jovanovic|Josif Tatic|Miodrag 'Miki' Krstovic|Renata Ulmanski|Milos Stojanovic|Gorica Popovic|Ljiljana Dragutinovic|Dana Todorovic|Sergej Trifunovic|Aljosa Vuckovic|Stole Novakovic|Nenad Nenadovic|Dragana Djukic|Momcilo 'Bajaga' Bajagic|Lena Kovacevic|Branko Knezevic|Vanja Janketic|Sandra Balaban|Olja Pesic|Katica Zeli|Jovan Mandic|Milan St. Protic|Predrag Markovic|Marko Stojanovic|Branko Kosar|Branko Djuric|Tanja Lesic|Bozidar Djurovic|Tatjana Torbica|Lepomir Ivkovic|Gordan Jovanovic|Ras Rastoder|Dule Stojanovic|Danusija Ataljanc|Slobodan Ivetic|Martin Candir|Nadica Svilar|Dusan Askovic|Nenad Stojanovic|Nikola Krneta
title: Profesionalac
